A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Let's say I'm an occasional SW fan. This means I've seen all the movies more than once and enjoyed them (tolerated I\, II & III). However\, I loved Rian Johnson's film. From what I've read\, I'm in the minority. I loved Rey & Luke's storyline. Liked Poe's story line. And am obsessed with Kylo Ren & Rey's complicated relationship. Canto Bight was visually beautiful but boring\, but I do love Rose. I loved seeing the character interactions more than any light saber fight. Sorry fanboys. Rian Johnson has created a new Star Wars fan.
